channel.title: How to make npc's face certain directions?
channel.description: I have moved the npcs to their correct postitions but I do not know how to make them face a certain direction they are all always facing south?

item.title: How to make npc's face certain directions?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

There is a bit value where you handle the appearance of a npc, most call it the NPCUpdateBlock, that handles the direction of the entity. Handle your face directions there.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npc's face certain directions?
